title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Second Floor, Room Plan/ Furniture Layout", January 26, 1937
medium: Graphite, black ink, and red color pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: JOB NO. 553-4/1/4"/ANDERSON, SAENGER/1/26/37, 2/15/37, OFFICE/3/5/37; lower right: MR. HAROLD ANDERSON HOUSE BEL AIR CAL./FURNITURE LAYOUT - SECOND FLOOR - SCALE 1/4"=1'-0"; descriptions, labels, and notations throughout in graphite
description: Floor plan and furniture layout for second floor. Two bedrooms, bathroom, and steamroom on west side of floor plan; porch extended from far left. Passage way at right leading to staircase. Large study at center of plan near south; guest room to right of study. Two dressing rooms and bathroom along north wall. Large master bedroom in lower right corner of plan with porch extended at far right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Second Floor, Room Plan/ Furniture Layout", January 26, 1937.
January 26, 1937. Graphite, black ink, and red color pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-625.
